column4: I tried to make a reservation through Whatsapp the day before but it was full. They recommend us to arrive early so at 7pm we were in the door. The found us a couple of seats in the bar. Food, drinks and service are great!!
One of the best restaurants Ive ever been too! The meat and the selection of other dishes is amazing. Highly recommend!

Andres Carne de Res during the Carnival period was particularly crazy - and a lot of fun for the kids. The food was good without being exceptional. The service was a little slow, but the size of the place probably explains that.
So much fun!! The music was amazing ! Food and drinks were great . Very unique with a good vibe, I would definitely recommend this to be on your to do list in Bogotá!
There are not words to accurately describe this place but it’s an experience that you can’t miss! The food was amazing as was the service and the entertainment.
Fun atmosphere, small plates, good for trying lots of different dishes, interesting drinks, friendly staff.
Andres Carnes de Res is a very famous restaurant with music and dancing floor. Great food, great attention, amazing party! Be aware, it is located 45 minutes away from Parque de la 93.

column3: Fabulous meal in this fun place
column4: We had a lovely evening in this restaurant - a great fun atmosphere and very good food. Would definitely recommend this and go back for a fun evening out.
Noisy restaurant informal ambience iconic place in Bogota . Meats exelent . Cocktails very diverse and original No wine list. A must to complete Columbia experience
An amazing restaurant where you can experience Colombian food. Fantastic ambiance and, for me , the highlight is decoration! You must visit if you visit Bogota!
It is a 5 floors restaurant with really great typical Colombian food! The staff is young and efficient! Definitely a place to go back!
Good food and great atmosphere. All of the staff also spoke English and the menu had translations when we were there which was a nice bonus.
Very fun and safe area to explore. We had our server just bring us her favorite dishes and it was a wonderful meal!
Stopped here first night for a great meal, great place to visit abc great food to share. Very lively with lots of celebrations.
Very nice restaurant with different floors. It is very interesting. Food is good and so is the service.
We had steak, and it was delicious. The chocolate cake was supreme. The ambience incredable. The music superrr. We had an awesome time. You have to go if you go to Bogota.
We visited the one in Chia, some 45 minutes away from Bogota but it was worthy. The food was very good as well as the ambience. A must visit place while in the area. Natalia was our superb waitress.

column3: Excellent Service, Food and Drinks, and Very Inexpensive
column4: My wife and I spent an evening drinking, dinning and dancing at the Infierno level. At the end of the night the bill was the equivalent of about $75.00. The facilities were clean, and security is paramount for them. They made us feel at home.
The environment is amazing. Excellent food, rather slow service. This place is a must,an excellent experience

column3: We love Andres Carne De Res!
column4: We love Andres Carne De Res! Entertainment, food, drinks all wrapped into one experience. Prices are fair and the food is delicious!
Dime of the food is great, some just ok, service could be better as is super slow, but overall a place you have to go to when in Bogota

It's fine - kinda like a TGI Fridays or Jack Astors. Food is really nothing special. Interesting to sit for a drink. I would skip this and go to the location in Chia which I found way more fun and less formulaic.
2nd time eating here. Good service very nice atmosphere and cozy decorations. All in a good experience
Awesome place with a truly unique atmosphere. Probably the biggest restaurant I’ve ever been to, excellent food and service. Pretty noisy but in a good way!
I had the opportunity to visit the restaurant which had a combination of vibrant and youthfulness in the ambience. Food was great.

Horrible the elevator was not working, someone with limited mobility has to be standing up for whatever time they want without calling to get the problem solved, would not recommend and would not come back!
Well, good food, amazing atmosphere and great decoration. The service could be better and the items are over price.

the place, service and food is outstanding. the decoration, the service is fast and well organized even though that has an extensive menu, The waitress camila recommend us fantastic dishes. I will return for sure.

column3: The must do plan in Bogota
column4: Great food, meats it's the speciality here, the menu is ample and diverse, at nights there's shows, the service some times is in custom and character, it can be a unique experience every time you go, never disappoints
Everything is about the experience. I went with my two daughters for a birthday celebration. They spend a lovely afternoon with all the activities. Highly recommended.

These place is great, live music, the service is very helpful and attentive. Special drinks superb. Food was great. Good place to have fun in group, if you want to have a quite dinner this is not the place.

column3: Great place to eat, the food is awesome!!!
column4: The place is really awesome!! the food is great, you must try Lmo al trapo" my God this is good!! Service is great. live music.

column3: A must when you visit Bogotá
column4: The place is amazingly decorated. There’s always something interesting to look at. The food is delicious; and the evening party a blast.

Went to Andres for dinner our last night in town which came highly recommended. The atmosphere is very cool but the food was mediocre at best. Pricey and service was very slow. Not a must eat at place.
This restaurant is huge and amazing it is like eating inside a modern art museum. There are 6 different floors. The best part is that the food was amazing as well!

column3: Awesome time! Great food! Excellent service
column4: We tried mollejas, chorizo argentino, arepaeguebo and also we ordered the Lomo al Trapo, everything was great!!
This is my favorite restaurant in Bogota, best service, best ambiance, best quality of food, best tasting food, best of everything! Totally recommended.

column3: An Amazing private ride with Mauricio to Andres Carne de Res Chia.
column4: We had a fabulous time, Mauricio wait for us and take us back to our hotel, will highly recommend Mauricio very professional and always on time.
Great place to eat, is a place that is mandatory to visit when coming to bogota. The service and food are good. Book before you go is recommendable.

column3: Good place to wait your flight
column4: Good Colombian food and mixed or influenced with other countries. The price are fair, considering that we are at the airport. I suggest to choose the "arepa de chocolo" as appetizer.
